001package com.technototes.library.hardware;
002
003import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
004
005/**
006 * Class for hardware devices with a sensor value
007 * <p>
008 * This name is just bad. I'd also like to add normalization to it, so we could scale input values
009 * to consistent ranges (triggers, joystick axes, distance sensors, servo ranges, etc...)
010 *
011 * @author Alex Stedman
012 */
013@Deprecated
014@SuppressWarnings("unused")
015public interface Sensored extends DoubleSupplier {
016    /**
017     * Get the sensor value
018     *
019     * @return The value
020     */
021    double getSensorValue();
022
023    @Override
024    default double getAsDouble() {
025        return getSensorValue();
026    }
027}
